name: XWUI Hover Card Component
description: Hover card component that displays a popover when hovering over a trigger element. Wraps XWUIPopover with hover-specific defaults and delay configurations. Useful for showing additional information on hover.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

openDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds before opening on hover

closeDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds before closing after mouse leave

openOnHover.description: Whether to open on hover (always true for hover card)

placement.description: Placement of the hover card relative to trigger

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the hover card

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

content.description: Content element or HTML string for the hover card

triggerElement.description: Trigger element or selector string to attach hover card to
